pages.text: The glowing biomass sacs of Beckons have long been a topic of study. Much like the $(l:items/mortifying_tentacle)Mortifying Tentacle$(), Vagrants appear to be capable of creating a smaller, more portable copy using a Factory bound to either a Stage III or Stage IV Beckon.
This item is likely used in the creation of $(l:items/pact)The Pact$(), a sinister parasitic scroll of unknown purpose.
